questions.stem: Choose the correct form: He ___ to school every day.
Fill in a daily object in English that you use to write.
questions.explain: Basic daily vocab: pen/pencil are acceptable; we expect 'pen' here.

questions.stem: Choose the correct past form: Yesterday I ___ to the park.
Choose the best word: I usually ___ up at 7 a.m.
questions.explain: First person singular in present simple: 'I wake up'.

questions.stem: Choose the correct form: She is ___ a book now.
questions.explain: Present continuous: be + verb-ing → is reading.

questions.stem: Travel vocab: The place where airplanes take off is called an ____.
